events.message: I have just filed a claim after my car was involved in a collision with another vehicle at the intersection.
The claim has been categorized under auto accident based on the incident details submitted by the customer.
An insurance agent has been assigned to manage the claim and will reach out shortly to discuss the next steps.
The insurance company officially acknowledged receipt of the claim and confirmed it is under review.
We have requested the customer to submit a copy of the police report and photos of the vehicle damage to proceed.
The customer has provided all required documents including the police report and vehicle repair estimates.
A detailed investigation has started to verify liability and the extent of the damages caused by the accident.
The investigation confirmed the accident circumstances and validated the submitted documents and estimates.
A settlement amount covering the vehicle repairs and related costs has been proposed to the claimant for approval.
The customer responded positively, agreeing with the proposed settlement and expressing appreciation for the service.
The insurance claim was approved and processing for payment has commenced based on the agreed terms.
The settlement payment was issued to the customerâ€™s bank account to cover the costs incurred from the accident.
Following payment, the claim has been officially closed with no further actions required from either party.
The case files and claim records have been archived securely in compliance with company retention policies.
